name: Vagrant Fury (itch)
description:
Vagrant Fury is a casual arcade shooter inspired by the 80's and 90's, with a powered up soundtrack and a pixel/voxel visual style. It's like a weekend afternoon action movie: full of explosions and psycho villains, but laid back at the same time. Try to spot all the movie references!

NOTE: A free demo is available right now (containing the opening cutscenes and the entire first level of the game); the full version will be available for sale in the beginning of November.

GIVE IT A SHOT (LITERALLY)

Check out our free demo; if you like the game, please consider buying the full version. Cheers!

FIREPOWER

Blowing stuff up doesn't have to blow: you'll have brand new weapons for each mission, and they'll reflect the character of the level you're playing. Try aiming for double, triple and penta-kills!

SPECIAL ABILITIES

When the going gets tough, the tough get powerups! Shoot enough baddies, and activate one of two special abilities: super offensive or mega defensive.

EVIL DUDES

Bosses with big guns and big mouths — just what every action hero needs! But beware: when they get cranky, they'll unleash their special attacks on you. Also featuring different enemy classes: Fighter, Tanker, Shooter, Grenadier, Bazooker.

ENJOY THE VIEW

Colorful level designs and cutscenes will take you through the City's neighbourhoods: from low-class to high-rise, there's violence and corruption everywhere, and you'll blast through it all.

GET READY TO VOXEL

Harnessing the power of computers salvaged from our local dumpster, we're able to offer you the most advanced voxel graphics on the market in 1990. VoxelPower™ — Because Pixel is Dead!

BE A HERO... A DARK HERO

A secret past! A plot full of twists and surprises! A hero's path, tragic but inspiring! Clichés you can trust! — (Action and Sci-fi Tropes Certified)

SYNTH FURY

Remember when music was good? Yeah, us too — that's why we have an awesome synthwave soundtrack! So you can be shootin' while groovin'!
